description:
FIND OUT WHY THE WORLD IS SLEEPING BETTER! White Noise provides ambient sounds of the environment to help you relax or sleep. Are you in a hotel and miss the familiar sound of your fan or air conditioner? Flying on a plane and just want to nap? Includes high quality looping noises such as crashing ocean waves, flowing stream water, and various rain storms.

Relax. Sleep better. Feel better.

FEATURES
- Easy to use interface quickly lets you select your favorite sound
- Play/Pause and Next/Previous controls
- Sound shutoff timer to save battery life
- Sound and timer settings are saved
- Screen fade to black after 10 seconds (Note: Locking screen stops audio for PDK apps which is why we implemented our own screen fade)
- Screen swipe left or right also changes sound
- Includes beautiful images that match the high quality of each sound

INCLUDES AMBIENT SOUNDS WITH PHOTOS: 
Air Conditioner, Airplane, Amazon Jungle, Beach Waves, Chimes, Crickets Chirping, Fire, Oscillating Fan, Brown Noise, Pink Noise, White Noise, Ocean Waves, Extreme Rain, Heavy Rain, Light Rain, Rain Storm, Shower, Stream Water, Thunder Storm, and Water.

Fan us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/tmsoft

Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/tmsoft

Visit our website at http://www.tmsoft.com/
versionNote: Play music in the background while listening to White Noise as it no longer disables media player at launch. As always your positive 5 star reviews keep the free updates coming!
